content: edge row 2 & 3 ending with edge row 2 sleeve row 11 chain 1 turn fold sleeve portion back on main body of scarf yarn over with mc and continuing with mc slip_stitch across main scarf to secure sleeve to main this will create your scarf sleeve fasten_off cut and weave in all remaining ends pattern copyright 2008 fp wear this pattern is for personal use only and may not be reproduced or distributed without express permission please contact info@fpwear com with any questions about the pattern or the terms of use
